website_summaries.verdict: Great when you want to look put together without killing your feet, but not meant for heavy-duty walking.
pros: Comes in black, brown, light grey and navy on Zappos
Amazon offers in blue, baby blue, bianco and panna cotta

customer_reviews.title: I saw all these great reviews about how comfortable these shoes are
customer_reviews.text: I saw all these great reviews about how comfortable these shoes are. I was really disappointed. I rushed ordered these before a week long training in Chicago. After one day of walking around the city, the spot where my soles touched the shoe are starting to rub off painfully. I'm not sure if the leather is wearing out already, or if it's just breaking the shoe in, but it hard to wear them for even half a day. I'm pretty disappointed. Such a shame they were so cute with dress shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Pangnia

customer_reviews.title: awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. so comfortable and well-made. the gold color is elegant, not too shiny, and goes with nearly everything, can be dressed up or down. the cushioned bottom allows me to wear these all day and while traveling with little discomfort. so pleased with these sandals! it took me a little while to get used to the feeling of the patterned bottom, but now i don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: I require shoes with good support, and usually can't wear flat sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals run a little bit wide. I had bought them before so knew that going into the purchase. I require shoes with good support, and usually can't wear flat sandals. But the heel on these provide enough support that I can wear and walk in them all day. I've bought the same sandal in 4-5 different colors :)
customer_reviews.author: jdcbld

customer_reviews.title: These are the worst Born shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst Born shoes I've ever owned, and I normally love them. The gold started fading just after a few wears. I've only owned them for less than 2 months and one of the straps holding up the back heel strap just popped off during a grocery store run. They already look old and as if they've been worn for years, despite light wear. Wish I had never purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Daughter.  Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. She wears plus size clothing so the width of her foot is a little bigger. These fit her perfect. I bought her 2 different colors and she bought a different color for herself. They look great on her. I also bought a pair for my other daughter who is regular size and they fit her perfect too. WIN
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: I'm annoyed to have to replace them so soon
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfy right out of the box and go well with all my outfits (I got these to wear as a fancier option than my birkenstocks). The gold on the straps seemed to fade quicker than expected (especially where the straps rub on each other). There's also a tiny piece of elastic under the buckle which after 6-7 months of wear (at least 3 times a week) is too stretched out. I'm annoyed to have to replace them so soon, but they've been comfortable and worn often.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals for Walking
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals - the only downside is that the back strap tends to slide down the back of my foot as I walk around. Other than that, they are incredibly comfortable and perfect for travel, teaching, and other activities that require a significant amount of standing and walking.
customer_reviews.author: VHScofield

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for city life
customer_reviews.text: I live in NYC. These sandals came right out of the box, onto my feet & onto the pavement of the city. They are the only sandals that I haven't had to go through the blister stage of my feet adjusting to the sandals. I wear them all day long, every day & they are super comfy. I'm a mom so I end up playing hard in them. I've gotten them soaking wet (not recommended by the company or me) and they are still holding up well. I'm thinking of buying a second pair since I know I'll wear these out before too long.
customer_reviews.author: Cibolover

customer_reviews.title: great sandal from born
customer_reviews.text: hello, we have been looking around for quality sandals. the local store only had a born sandal in an odd color. amazon listed this sandal in two colors we needed. it fit perfectly in the size we ordered. the straps are not too tight and feel fine. the soles are a great conversation starter, (both the tops and bottoms) the delivery was very fast and now we have several sandals for different occasions. born makes great shoes and sandals. great product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: jnaki

customer_reviews.title: MY BEST SHOES EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a pair of thee shoes daily since 10-14 I just ordered two more pair. The pair that has even worn the longest time is slightly stretched to perhaps an 8.5 from an 8. I haven't tried washing them to see if they will shrink. I just ordered new ones as i don't want to be without them.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Know your style of sandle
customer_reviews.text: I love Born sandles! They are comfortable & have lovely design. These sandles fit well yet I wasn't able to adjust to the thong footbed so returned them & ordered an open toe footbed sandle by Born.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Born sandals, and I love them! I find many Born shoe styles to be a little old lady-ish, but that is not so with this pair. Based off of other reviews, I ordered a half size larger than usual (9 instead of 8.5), and the sandals fit perfectly. They don't offer much arch support but the foot bed is cushy and comfortable. I have chicken ankles and will need to add another hole to the strap so they're not as loose, but otherwise I'm very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SaE of Doom

customer_reviews.title: They had great support and I just had to tighten the straps ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my trip to Europe and wore them all day, every day in Spain! They had great support and I just had to tighten the straps after they - eventually - stretched out to keep my foot from slipping about when walking on cobblestone. I didn't have any problems wearing them from the minute I got them! I've recommended them to friends planning their own trips!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Unfortunately, my daughter stepped on the back of the shoe when walking behind me and one of the straps tore out of the bottom of the shoe so they're unwearable. This was within the first month of wearing. I don't blame the shoe, but it was certainly unfortunate! They were my favorite pair of sandals--easy to slip on and cute!
customer_reviews.author: jollygreengiant

customer_reviews.title: Finally a casual summer shoe that's comfortable and not a flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Finally a casual summer shoe that's comfortable and not a flip flop. My only complaint is the straps tend to be a bit loose so your feet have a bit of wiggle room. The pattern on the sole does not bother me. It's minimal and I'd think you'd need skin like the Pea Princess for it to bother you. I purchased in black as well.
customer_reviews.author: momofmanygirls

customer_reviews.title: cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are overall great sandals. The fit is perfect. I just find the soles to be a little uncomfortably textured and stiff. But not too bad, I have done a lot of walking and shopping in them and they are still in great shape :: really good quality :: well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ceasar McChicken

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! I've put them through hell, walked long hours in them, walked in the rain, and I'm a pretty clutzy person. They hardly look any different, other than a little change of color on the soft footpad. I would get more, and I have recommended them to many people!
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are super comfortable. The leather is soft and flexible and the padding is thicker and more shock absorbent than most sandals. The color is great. I have worn them all day with no discomfort, and even though I have a wide foot, and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina35

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! I've bought several different styles of Born shoes in the past, because they tend to be so comfortable and cute. This sandal did not disappoint. No break in period. I walked a couple of miles in them right away with no problems. That said, it's not a super supportive shoe, so if you need that, you may prefer something else. I tend to wear more minimal shoes. The style is very nice- nothing too trendy, got compliments right away. Makes my less-than-perfect feet look nice.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Super sandal!
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable. I got them in white last summer, found the coral this spring. I wish they had more colors and didn't discontinue making them. I would buy them in more colors plus another white!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort in a cute, strappy sandal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these cute sandals for a vacation in Thailand. They were comfortable enough to wear all day, but cute and strappy enough to wear with a dress. I did have my hubby put an extra hole in the strap as it was too loose on my ankle when buckled in the last hole. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Hick

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sandals. The footbed has padding, and the straps keep the sandal fairly secure on the foot and did not pull or rub my foot wrong at all. So far I've worn these to work all day and out shopping with no comfort issues. I am a size 9 with high arches and medium to slightly wide feet, and thought these were true to size. Would consider getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: lzcam

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super comfortable with the padded footbed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable with the padded footbed. I love them so much I bought a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Woros

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I've worn a size 10 for 30+ years but these told me I was a bigger size. I don't think so. Bu bye
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Needed comfortable and cute sandals for walking outside a lot and ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed comfortable and cute sandals for walking outside a lot and standing. Was surprised to find sandals from Born that I actually thought were cute. And so far they have been much more comfortable than my other sandals.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these sandals! I bought them for summer, which comes early here in south GA, and thought because of the brand, the nice leather, and the price, they would at least last me through the season. Unfortunately, they broke after 4 wears...and I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, though
customer_reviews.text: Straps were much looser than I anticipated so my foot moves around a lot. They are comfortable, though.
customer_reviews.author: JFed

customer_reviews.title: Liked the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoe, but have a very wide foot and the strap across the front of the foot was just too tight. Did not want to take a chance and see if they would eventually loosen up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: El Cid

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sandals. One of my little toes likes to get tangled up though. I tighten the back strap and that seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, love the color. I like the sizing strap is around the ankle so the sandal fits better. I love Born sandals. I wear them until they fall apart, about 3 summers worth.
customer_reviews.author: L. Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cute. I have wide feet and barely finds something comfortable to wear on daily bases. This serves me well in summer and fall. Now I need something for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Fadwa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ended up reselling them, because they fit way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Zareth M. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Run big!
customer_reviews.text: Love born shoes and especially these, but being in between sizes sure is disappointing. I'm going to have to fix something to keep my feet from slipping all over the place causing sore feet after wearing.
customer_reviews.author: nanantexas54

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy. The mango/orange color blends well with ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. The mango/orange color blends well with my olive skin, making them more of a neutral. The flower pattern on the bottom might chafe the first couple of times you wear them, but your foot gets used to them.
customer_reviews.author: spinnie

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but good enough to keep
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I previously bought them in black at a store and they were so comfortable that I wanted them in another color. For some reason, these soles are not as comfortable as the black pair. There's design on the bottom of the sole that I assume is for non-slip purposes, but in this color, I feel the designs as though there is something stuck to the shoe. Aside from that and the fact that they are slightly loose even on my wide feet, they're comfortable enough and they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Show off that fresh pedicure!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. A wonderful sandal which goes with a dressy dress, a floppy skirt or just a nice pair of blue jeans. Comfortable out of the box. An arch support and a cushy sole makes these work.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love these sandald, very comfortable! I eear a 81/2 and ordered a sz down 8. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: wiser

customer_reviews.title: If these weren't expensive, I would buy them again ...
customer_reviews.text: If these weren't expensive, I would buy them again. I wore these all around Europe. DONT GET THEM WET. It ruins them.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Z.

customer_reviews.title: shoes are comfortable. They have good padding but arch support not ...
customer_reviews.text: shoes are comfortable. They have good padding but arch support not enough for a very high arch. I wouldn't recommend them for wearing all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Marin

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: Lousy arch support, but I just glue in Dr. Scholls rubber arch supports in all my shoes. This shoe accommodates the arch supports just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes I can wear all day. Quality build worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very comfortable. Good fit. Good quality. Wish I had them in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alsal

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable ordered another pair for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: No break in time needed! So comfortable ordered another pair for my daughter. They're super comfortable walking and still cute with maxi dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Steph from MT

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of this sandal and it fits nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this sandal and it fits nicely and comfortably. I like saldals with a heal strap.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super cute. They are a bit sparkly in person
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute. They are a bit sparkly in person, not too much, just very cute. They are a bit narrow, only over my bunion. So comfortable, except for bunion part!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for your feet
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable you'll never want to take them off. And they're cute. What more can a girl want?!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals and the blue color. Now have them in 3 colors.
customer_reviews.author: liesa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes but they were a little too short because of the way the front was cut. If they offered a half size it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Blindlady

customer_reviews.title: Buy one pair and you will be back for more
customer_reviews.text: These sandals do more than look great--they FEEL great. Imagine strappy sandals that don't rub anywhere! Fit like a dream, and too cute not to be your go-to pair when you want to feel girly.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: born is fantastic as always
customer_reviews.text: these were quite lovely. I'll get another pair if I can next spring.
customer_reviews.author: christina mitchell

customer_reviews.title: No Pain!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually cannot wear flats due to a leg injury, but I really wanted to try these since I know the BORN brand. They were so incredibly comfortable. I was out all day with my daughter and forgot I was even out and about which is unusual because I am usually in pain within an hour. I actually just ordered another color.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable! However, the teal color is fading to a smokey tan after heavy use for two months. I personally like the weathered look, but others may not.
customer_reviews.author: Vero Rose Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look different on my feet. The straps seem to be too far back towards the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Debbiesan

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: very comfy. no "break in" period needed. that was a relief. Only been wearing them a week, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: sdmom

customer_reviews.title: Need New Sandals for the Summer? These are the Ones!
customer_reviews.text: I always love Born shoes, but these are especially great for walking around all day. They are extremely versatile and work well with jeans or dresses. The design has the benefit that your ankle is not being wrapped, so your legs look longer (not shorter) even though they are flats. I'm already looking at my next pair!
customer_reviews.author: Nichez

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: wear all the time, love the brand and these particular sandals. Fast shipping as well. I am between 10 and 11 sizes, this brand is better at 11 for me.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable I purchased these for a vacation at Disney
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I purchased these for a vacation at Disney. My feet didn't feel fatigued or tired from wearing them and they are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: These lost their shape really fast. I wore them ...
customer_reviews.text: These lost their shape really fast. I wore them all summer but they won't make it for a second summer.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from day one. Great design, great fit. I had a little bit of a problem passing the string through the buckle, but it got a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: DePapa

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather = good to your feet
customer_reviews.text: Quality leather = good to your feet! Great for all day wear, especially at work. My last pair lasted 6 years. The price is high but so are my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mindfulness Matters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Born sandals and these are super cute and comfy as are all my others.
customer_reviews.author: jinxie

customer_reviews.title: Nice everyday sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and true to size. Can wear them all day without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had ordered two pair. They are well made and quite comfortable
customer_reviews.author: battleshipcapt

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the color wore off too easy in a few areas. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to sit around and also walk. This is my second pair. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Maya A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of this shoe and I love them. Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H. Benson

customer_reviews.title: I liked the style but the straps are too wide for ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style but the straps are too wide for my foot and could not adjust them sufficiently to fit,
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect sandal for work as a teacher
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect sandal for work as a teacher. Not a heel and not a casual flip flop. They look great with dresses and capris.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! They can be worn with shorts or dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Ajb

customer_reviews.title: Great footwear!
customer_reviews.text: the only problem was I could not get the color I wanted! Great footwear!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Soft Supple Leather!  Gorgeous comfortable sandle!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Born sandals! This Mai style is very comfortable. Absolutely no breaking in required. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Yokoyama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and they fit perfectly. I highly recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: I take a 6.5, but Born does not carry 1/2 size increment, so I took a 7.0 which runs big. I returned it and ordered one size down, ie 6.0.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I'm a pharmacist on my feet all day and I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shores

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, Born
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Born shoes for years, but this year the strap sandals are shorter and my toes hang over the front. I have ordered 3 different pairs that I like and they are all short. I am really disappointed this time and will probably be looking for a different brand. Born still makes a superior shoe, just short this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Well made, comfortable and still look good after lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: uktravailer

customer_reviews.title: I have heard such amazing things about Born
customer_reviews.text: I have heard such amazing things about Born, so I couldn't wait to try these cute sandals. They are horrible. The cute etching on the sole of the shoe actually hurts the bottom of your foot and will give you blisters. Also there is no support or cushioning in the shoe whatsoever. I was so excited to try this brand, but I will not be purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are cute, soft, and comfy!! I wear them all the time....
customer_reviews.author: dhudson

customer_reviews.title: Love love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love love these sandals! I wear an 11M, and they fit perfectly. They have good support, and once you fix the strap to fit, it slides on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Newman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not quite the right fit..
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sandle. But the toe part didn't fit right on one of the shoes and made it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Reinhardt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfortable and great for my narrow feet! Already have them in 2 colors and want more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan W. Fister

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: will stretch as they are leather. dont let them get wet. comfortable. i am a true size 11 m/b
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... straps are tighter around my toe than I would like or expect
customer_reviews.text: The straps are tighter around my toe than I would like or expect, but otherwise these are great sandals - love Born!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Talley-Pixley

customer_reviews.title: Cute strappy sandal
customer_reviews.text: This brand always seems to run a little large, but the adjustability of the straps keeps them secure on your feet, so it really wasn't an issue in this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Candace L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that the straps seem to stretch. When you try to tighten them, it's very difficult to thread the excess strap.
customer_reviews.author: Dana V

customer_reviews.title: Top Too Big
customer_reviews.text: They foot-bed was sooooo comfortable on these shoes and I so wanted to love them. Unfortunately the straps at the top of my foot didn't seem to hold me in. Maybe I got a pair that were stretched from a previous owner. I may try again. They were really cute and not orthotic looking which I liked. I am in my 30's and need good shoes, but still want them to look cute and not feel like a grandma when I am wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love these Born
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the start. Fit is true to size. Great sandals and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: MARY ELLEN KILLEN

customer_reviews.title: but I have wide feet and the front of the foot was too narrow so my feet looked like giant rhinoceros spilling over the front si
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but I have wide feet and the front of the foot was too narrow so my feet looked like giant rhinoceros spilling over the front sides. Too bad, they were cute, but can't have shoes that make your feet look like rhinoceroses.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vacation Sandals
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews for Born sandals and decided to try this design for an upcoming vacation with a lot of walking. I am an 8-1/2 and I sized up to a 9. So happy I did or my toes would have hung over. These sandals are the most comfortable sandals I have ever owned and this style is so cute! I got the white and they are so versatile. I will be wearing them with dresses, shorts, jeans. And they are lightweight so perfect to pop into your carry-on when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Fits true to size. Thinking of ordering in another color.
customer_reviews.author: mary berry

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They're a little bit narrow by my toes, but otherwise quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep
customer_reviews.text: They were very uncomfortable between my toes. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: COLOR BLIND
customer_reviews.text: These are not red, despite what it says on the box, but not red. They will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and cute sandals. I wore then all day and my feet never got sore. They can be casual or dressy. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: They're very comfortable, but what they make up for in comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: They're very comfortable, but what they make up for in comfort they lack entirely in physical appeal. They look nice online but poorly made, very clunky, and make your feet look at least a size or two larger than they are. Also nearly impossible to close the back strap since it is too large for the band that is supposed to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, yet stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very versatile, can be dressed up or dressed down.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine M. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! They can be dressed up or down. So versatile. The fit was right on. Super comfortable and cute! I can always rely on Born to come through. Wish they came in more colors though so I could get more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Too much exposed toes
customer_reviews.text: Too much of the toes exposed. Made my feet look awkward with toes hanging out. They would be perfect if one more strap were added.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mastio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to walk around in Venice for hours a day. They are my go-to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylyn Bergner

customer_reviews.title: "Born For Support"
customer_reviews.text: Please note: I prefer more arch support for my feet, even though they do have some support.
